## \_Array.mapRange property

Like [arrayMap()](./rc-js-util.arraymap.md) with integer range as input.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static readonly mapRange: typeof arrayMapRange;
```

## Remarks

Where `from` and `to` are equal a length 1 array is returned, NaN input is not supported.

See [arrayMapRange()](./rc-js-util.arraymaprange.md)<!-- -->.
